genresAdvancedInfo.name: scottish americana
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Scottish Americana is a blend of Scottish folk music and American roots music. It often features acoustic instruments such as fiddles, mandolins, and guitars, as well as traditional Scottish instruments like bagpipes and the accordion. Scottish Americana artists often sing about themes such as emigration, love, and loss. Artists such as The Proclaimers and Runrig are known for their Scottish Americana sound.
